title: Equipping Your Kids to Handle Money, Part 8
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary: Teaching children the value of money is important but where to start? John and Danny talk about helping kids to seethe difference between buying something you want and just spending money because you can.
description: Teaching children the value of money is important but where to start? John and Danny talk about helping kids to seethe difference between buying something you want and just spending money because you can.
